languages.text: {n}Рыжеволосый гигант зло и радостно скалится вам.{/n} "Ну вот и встретились, юкко лицемерн{mf|ый|ая}. Меня все мучило чувство, что я не исполнил до конца долг перед Всеотцом, что-то не доделал... Кого-то не прикончил".

{n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжеволосый гигант зло и радостно скалится вам.{/n} "Ну вот и встретились, юкко лицемерн{mf|ый|ая}. Меня все мучило чувство, что я не исполнил до конца долг перед Всеотцом, что-то не доделал... Кого-то не прикончил".

traits.locale_text: {n}The read-headed giant gives you a evil, exhilarated grin.{/n} "Here we meet again, you hypocritical jukko! There was this feeling gnawing at me — that I did not completely fulfil my duty before the Allfather. Did not finish something — or, rather, somebody — off."

{n}The read-headed giant gives you a evil, exhilarated grin.{/n} "Here we meet again, you hypocritical jukko! There was this feeling gnawing at me — that I did not completely fulfil my duty before the Allfather. Did not finish something — or, rather, somebody — off."

{n}The red-headed giant gives you an evil, exhilarated grin.{/n} "Here we meet again, you hypocritical jukko! There was this feeling gnawing away at me, that I didn't completely fulfil my duty before the Allfather. I didn't croak someone."

{n}The red-headed giant gives you an evil, exhilarated grin.{/n} "Here we meet again, you hypocritical jukko! There was this feeling gnawing away at me, that I didn't completely fulfil my duty before the Allfather. I didn't croak someone."

{n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced jukko! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

{n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

languages.text: {n}Le géant aux cheveux flamboyants vous adresse un sourire menaçant et exalté.{/n} « Comme on se retrouve, espèce de fourbe ! J'étais rongé par le sentiment de ne pas avoir totalement accompli mon devoir envers le Père de Tous... comme s'il y avait une personne bien particulière que je devais encore tuer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le géant aux cheveux flamboyants vous adresse un sourire malveillant et exalté.{/n} « Comme on se retrouve, espèce de fourbe ! J'étais rongé par le sentiment de ne pas avoir totalement accompli mon devoir devant le Père de Tous... comme s'il y avait une personne bien particulière que je devais encore tuer. »

languages.text: {n}El gigante pelirrojo te muestra una sonrisa amenazadora y eufórica.{/n} «¡Volvemos a vernos, gusano traicionero! Tenía una sensación que me reconcomía, como si aún no hubiera cumplido con mi deber hacia el Padre de todas las cosas... como si me faltara alguien por matar».
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gigante pelirrojo te muestra una sonrisa malvada y eufórica.{/n} «¡Volvemos a encontrarnos, jukko hipócrita! Me reconcomía la sensación de que no había completado mi deber ante el Padre de todas las cosas. Me faltaba alguien por matar».

languages.text: {n}乌尔法露出了充满兴奋与恶意的笑容。{/n}“我们又见面了，你这该死的两面派！某种感觉一直在折磨着我，我感觉我并没有真正履行好全父的职责……因为我还有个该杀的人没杀。”
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法对你露出了兴奋的笑容，充满了邪恶的意味。{/n}“我们又见面了，你这道貌岸然的人渣！在这之前，某种感觉一直在折磨着我。我感觉我并没有真正履行好全父的职责，因为我有该杀的人没杀。”

languages.text: {n}Der rothaarige Riese grinst dich bedrohlich an, berauscht.{/n} "So sehen wir uns wieder, Ihr verlogener Wurm! Ein Gefühl nagt seit langem an mir, als hätte ich meine Pflicht dem Allvater gegenüber noch nicht erfüllt ... Als hätte ich jemanden noch nicht getötet, den ich töten soll."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der rothaarige Riese grinst dich böse, fast berauscht an.{/n} "So sehen wir uns wieder, Ihr heuchlerisches Ungeziefer! Die ganze Zeit über hat dieses Gefühl an mir genagt, dass ich meine Pflicht dem Allvater gegenüber nicht vollständig erfüllt habe. Ich habe niemand getötet."

languages.text: {n}赤毛の巨人は邪悪かつ愉快そうな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「また会ったな、二枚舌の虫め！全知の父の前で義務を完璧に果たせなかったという思いに苦しめられていたのだ…俺が殺すべき相手を殺しきれなかったような思いにな」
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."

traits.locale_text: {n}赤毛の巨人は邪悪かつ愉快そうな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「また会ったな、二枚舌の虫め！全知の父の前で義務を完璧に果たせなかったという思いに苦しめられていたのだ…俺が殺すべき相手を殺しきれなかったような思いにな」

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı dev, tehditkâr ve coşkulu bir şekilde sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Yeniden karşılaştık iki suratlı solucan! İçimi kemiren bir şey hissediyordum, sanki Yücebaba'ye karşı görevimi tamamlayamamışım gibi... Öldürmem gereken birini henüz öldürmemişim gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-headed giant gives you a menacing, exhilarated grin.{/n} "We meet again, you two-faced worm! I've had this feeling gnawing away at me, as if I haven't yet fulfilled my duty to the Allfather... As if I haven't yet killed someone I should."
